definition: to hold/to contain/to grasp/to take hold of/handle/particle marking the following noun as a direct object/classifier for objects with handle/classifier for small objects: handful

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: They hit him, they gave him a bullet in his heart'.
sentences.chinese: 他們就打他，還把把子彈射進了他的心臟。

sentences.english: If do not arise to repeat a value in great quantities, can consider to ravel clause.
sentences.chinese: 如果不產生大量重複值，可以考慮把子句拆開。

sentences.english: I found an old rusty wood-saw without any handle;
sentences.chinese: 我找到了一把生滿了鏽的舊鋸子，連把子也沒有。

sentences.english: When 2 people drink blood wine to do obeisance a son, each other already the heart hide intention to murder.
sentences.chinese: 兩人喝血酒拜把子之時，彼此已經心藏殺機。

sentences.english: Squeeze the handle of the Print Head Latch and lift it to release the print heads.
sentences.chinese: 擠壓打印頭卡齒的把子，將其擡起來釋放打印頭。

sentences.english: You'd better to spit out the seeds in your palm, and then put them on the plate.
sentences.chinese: 你應該把子吐在手上，然後再放到盤子裏。

sentences.english: The rifle is able to throw a bullet about 4 miles.
sentences.chinese: 這把來復槍可以把子彈射出大約4英里。

sentences.english: I can lash my knife to the butt of one of the oars.
sentences.chinese: 我可以把刀子綁在一支槳的把子上。

sentences.english: He re-aimed and shot a tree instead.
sentences.chinese: 於是，他移動槍口，把子彈射在一顆樹上。

sentences.english: Su remnants snow pushed a son Xuan Shuo easy, the latter hurriedly comes along.
sentences.chinese: 蘇殘雪推了一把子軒朔易，後者連忙上前。

definition: hammer drill for boring through rock
branches of a tree/fork of a tree
adopted son (traditional adoption, i.e. without legal ramifications)
wooden club (used to beat clothes in washing)
to light a fire for cooking
